attributes.action: Illegal Drug free England and save our Generation
attributes.additional_details:
I would like to bring Government's attention to seriously take action against selling of illegal drugs which causes to destroy our youth and society.

I would like to request to start a special task force and CID police to catch all gangs , Groups and involved person.

If Government will make law to deport and cancle their visas of  involved people am sure we can control this biggest problem.

I wish to offer a detail strategy if Government give me one opportunity .
